newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian share turnover leaps, Unibanka at new high.
newsitem.headline: Latvian share turnover leaps, Unibanka at new high.

text.p: Turnover on the Latvian stock exchange jumped on Thursday and leading stock Unibanka also climbed to a new high, the Riga stock exchange said.
Market turnover was 165,069 lats, compared with 45,226 lats of trade on Tuesday.
Unibanka accounted for most of the business, notching up turnover of 158,488 lats. Its shares edged up to a new best level of 1.76 lats, two lats higher.
The shares of Riga Transport Fleet, on the official list with Unibanka, were also well traded at turnover of 4,571 lats. Its shares were unchanged at 60 santimes.
On the secondary list, fish cannery Kaija was again active. It made turnover of 1,097 lats but its stock price dipped to 31 santimes from 32.
